comment.text: This translation key is used to mark a file as a version. It appears as a button label on a version row in a version history page, allowing users to select a version to update or revert to. The exact text may vary depending on the selected context (revision or version).

usage.context:
t={t}
 title={
 index > 0
 ? isVersion
 ? t("Files:MarkAsRevision")
 : t("Files:MarkAsVersion")
 : ""
 }
 />
 <div className="version-link-box">
 <Link

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'وضع علامة كإصدار' while literally meaning 'Place a mark as version', doesn't fully capture the nuance of 'Mark as version'. A more natural and idiomatic translation would be something like 'تحديد كإصدار' (Tahdeed ka isdar) or 'تمييز كإصدار' (Tamyeez ka isdar).

While "Versiya kimi qeyd edin" is a literal translation, it doesn't quite capture the nuance of 'Mark as version' in this context. It sounds a bit awkward. A more natural phrasing would convey the action of assigning a version.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider alternatives like "Versiyanın olaraq seçin" or "Versiya olaraq işarə edin" which better conveys the intended meaning of assigning a version.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Korean translation "버전으로 표시" is a literal translation but might not be the most natural or accurate representation of "Mark as version" in a software context. It could be interpreted as 'display as a version' rather than 'assign a version number'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider alternatives like "버전으로 설정" (set as version), "버전 지정" (assign version), or "버전 관리" (version control) depending on the specific functionality.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "අනුවාදයක් ලෙස සලකුණු කරන්න" literally translates to "Mark as a translation". This doesn't accurately convey the meaning of 'Mark as version', which implies assigning a version number or a particular version status to a file. It's translating the word 'translation' instead of 'version'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: A more accurate translation would depend on the specific context of 'Mark as version'. Possible suggestions include: "අවස්ථාවක් ලෙස සලකුණු කරන්න" (Mark as status), "වර්ෂනයක් ලෙස සලකුණු කරන්න" (Mark as version - literal, but potentially confusing), or "අවසම් යථාර්ථයක් ලෙස සලකුණු කරන්න" (Mark as final version - if appropriate).
